rescuecore2.worldmodel

Class AbstractProperty

  • java.lang.Object
    • rescuecore2.worldmodel.AbstractProperty
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Property
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BooleanProperty, DoubleProperty, EdgeListProperty, EntityRefListProperty, EntityRefProperty, IntArrayProperty, IntProperty, Point2DProperty

    public abstract class AbstractProperty
extends java.lang.Object
implements Property
    Abstract base class for Property implementations.
